title.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, June 17, 1926No Swede Should Fail to Partake in The

div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, June 17, 1926NO SWEDE SHOULD FAIL TO PARTAKE IN THE

body.p: in the divinely beautiful Good-Templar Park at Geneva, Illinois Sunday, June 20th, 1926
Singing by Svithiod Singing Club, Chicago, Illinois.
Music by I.O.G.T. Band, Chicago, Ill.
Singing by I.O.G.T. Chorus, Rockford, Ill.
Addresses by George B. Safford, of the Anti-Saloon League, and Theodore Johnson, of Chicago.
Soccer Football: Chicago Swedish-Am. A.A. vs. Rockford Swedish Am. A.A.
Exhibitions in Gymnastics by Rockford Swedish Gymnastic Club
Dancing all day in the spacious Pavilion -- Fine Orchestra.
Come out here and have a moving picture taken of you!
Arrangements have been made with the Knapp & Norling Film Co. to photograph all happenings at this festival. This film will be shown later all over the United States and in Sweden.
A beautiful Willys Knight Six Sedan will be given away free.
